extracted_playbook.title: Review Pulse Secure Connect Integrity Tool Guide
extracted_playbook.description: Review the Pulse Secure Connect Integrity Tool Quick Start Guide and Customer FAQs to understand the tool usage.

extracted_playbook.title: Run Pulse Secure Connect Integrity Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Run the Pulse Secure Connect Integrity Tool. If virtualized, take a snapshot before running. If the appliance is physical, consider the consequences of rebooting and running the tool and contact Ivanti for assistance or questions.

extracted_playbook.title: Continue Running Integrity Tool Daily
extracted_playbook.description: Continue to run the tool daily until the XML mitigations have been implemented or the patch has been deployed.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Vendor Mitigations
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the interim XML configurations listed in the 'Workaround' section of SA44784 to provide significant protection against threat actor activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Software Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the latest software version as per the process outlined on Ivanti Pulse Secureâ€™s website which contains security enhancements.

extracted_playbook.condition: Has the Integrity Checker Tool found mismatched or unauthorized files?

extracted_playbook.title: Contact CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Contact CISA to report findings of mismatched or unauthorized files.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Ivanti Pulse Secure
extracted_playbook.description: Contact Ivanti Pulse Secure for assistance in capturing forensic information.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Unauthenticated Web Requests Log
extracted_playbook.description: Review 'Unauthenticated Web Requests' log for evidence of exploitation, if enabled.

extracted_playbook.title: Change All Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Change all passwords associated with accounts passing through the Pulse Secure environment, including user accounts, service accounts, and administrative accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Logs for Unauthorized Authentications
extracted_playbook.description: Review logs for any unauthorized authentications originating from the Pulse Connect Secure appliance IP address or the DHCP lease range of the Pulse Connect Secure appliance's VPN lease pool.

extracted_playbook.title: Inspect for Unauthorized Applications and Tasks
extracted_playbook.description: Look for unauthorized applications and scheduled tasks in environments. Ensure no new administrators were created and non-privileged users were not added to privileged groups.

extracted_playbook.title: Remediate Pulse Connect Secure Appliance
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the external-facing interface, save the system and user config, perform a factory reset via the Serial Console, update the appliance to the newest version, re-import the saved config, and re-enable the external interface.

extracted_playbook.title: Run Pulse Secure Connect Integrity Tool Again
extracted_playbook.description: Run the Pulse Secure Connect Integrity Tool again after remediation has been taken place to ensure any infection is remediated.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Anomalous Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor for malicious, suspicious, or anomalous activity or files, and consider guidance in KB44764 for further actions.
